task.title: Groups as agents
task.shortdesc: Entities extracted from MARC 11X and 71X fields.

context.p: As agents, groups can contribute to creation activities or production activities. The table below summarizes the domain and properties used in activities involving group entities.
context.note: The role of the group entity is derived from $e or $4 for MARC 110 and 710 and from $j or $4 for MARC 111 and 711. When those subfields are absent, a generic role of creator is assigned when 11X is the source or contributor when 71X is the source.

row.entry: Do not include agent references in nestedmembers_exemplified_by → HumanMadeObject.

section.title: Source data
section.codeblock: --- name: GroupsAsAgents sampleBibs: - 7 # 710 - 9 # 710 - 11 # 110 - 19 # 111 - 38 # 110 - 127 # 111 - 426 # 711 - 947 # 711 - 5132502 # produced_by # Source data fields fieldSpec: - 11001abcdeg - 11101acdegjnqu - 71001abcdeg - 71101acdegjnqu trimPunctuation: true scriptInclusion: BOTH

step.cmd: After applying the instructions in , add an embedded reference to the group entity within the record-level resource.

substep.cmd: Process production activities (domain: HumanMadeObject → shows → VisualItem).
